newsitem.title: USA: Complete Wellness Centers files for 1 mln shr IPO.
newsitem.headline: Complete Wellness Centers files for 1 mln shr IPO.

text.p: Complete Wellness Centers Inc said Monday it filed a statement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for an initial public offering of one million shares of common stock.
The company, a developer of multidisciplinary medical centers, said in a release that the offer is expected to price between $6 and $8 per share.
Lead underwriter for the deal, National Securities Corp in New York, said the company is expected to make its market debut in late January on the Nasdaq National Market under the symbol "CMWL."

Complete Wellness said the IPO also includes one million redeemable common stock purchase warrants to buy an additional one million shares of common stock. The redeemable warrants are expected to price at $0.10 per warrant, it added.
